title: its all my fault thank you riot
body: you know its amazing how much money i have thrown into this game and like the idiot i am i actually expected this game to work. amazing how i get penalized for riot games shit game. all i want to do is play this game but cant because i keep having to wait a 20 minute penalty for a bugsplat which then i get reported for afking or the game says i quit too much. thats amazing. i love when i get a bugsplat and when i try to reconnect the client refuses to start up again. then i restart everything and some how now my computer is slower than dial up. but instead of right fixing this garbage client they put out now champs and skin so we can all buy and spend all of our money on this "free" game. but its all my fault for investing my money in a game that i expected to be able to actually play. im the idiot for doing everything in my power to make sure the game works on my computer to then have 20 minute wait penalties. i guess im just the idiot crazy guy who thought with all the money riot makes they can have a functioning game. its all my fault because im the idiot. thank you riot for teaching me that.

replies.body:
The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will continue to stack higher queue times and games with each leave which I can imagine is going to get pretty frustrating.  You may want to take a break from queueing up and work on resolving whatever is causing these bugsplats.  Leaverbuster will treat everyone equally, not just you, because it still causing other players a bad experience for being down a player. 

The nature of bugsplats are usually game files, drivers, or hardware.  You may want to run through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide and test it in custom games so your leaverbuster doesn't escalate.  I hope that helps!

Maybe you should try using their support pages? Oh wait thats right... They dont work cause "different region" even though the support page doesnt have regions... "DO NOT post content regarding account suspensions here. Submit a ticket instead." Sure, suuuuure. I cant really imagine that youll ever be able to let this go unless you do something very drastic bro ;)

Sorry to hear you're having trouble contacting us, but there's another way.  You can email us directly via support@riotgames.com instead of using the ticketing center.  If you want to go over an account suspension issue, feel free to make another post and I'll take a look.  Just a heads up, the PB team via ticket can consider any disputes regarding it though.
